The Real Housewives of Atlanta USA

1.title: To Love and to Cherish

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Cynthia and Porsha have fallen hard for their new men while Eva has a new ring and a new baby. Kandi's accomplishments continue to grow, but her daughter reveals that their family life has taken a back seat. NeNe prepares to fight alongside Gregg as he begins his battle with cancer, while Porsha rallies all the ladies for a surprise trip to Miami to show the Leakes their support.

2.title: South Peach

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Porsha continues to enjoy her romantic birthday weekend with Dennis, but the honeymoon phase comes to a halt after a "brush" with danger. Kandi, Cynthia, Eva, and Marlo touch down in Miami ready to surprise NeNe as she hits the comedy stage for the first time since Gregg's diagnosis.

3.title: A New Addition

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Eva and Porsha hit the gym. Kandi reconnects with old friend Shamari DeVoe from the music group Blaque. NeNe and Gregg travel to Houston and receive surprising news about Gregg's recovery. The ladies attend ATL Live to check out Shamari's performance. Kandi finds out potentially damaging information about Porsha's man.

4.title: Pass the Peach, Throw the Shade

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Porsha faces Dennis' mother. Kandi and Todd meet with Dr. Jackie. Shamari drops a bomb on her mother-in-law. Cynthia hosts a Bailey-Cue. NeNe hears a surprising rumor. The ladies find themselves in the hot seat during Cynthia's Pass the Peach game.

5.title: Tatted Tales

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: Kandi gets advice from the women about sharing details from Porsha's boyfriend's past. Eva's mother pushes her daughter's buttons regarding the wedding's budget. Shamari reveals more details about her open relationship with her husband.

6.title: Whining and Dining

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: Shamari and Ronnie open up to Kandi and Todd about their relationship. Kandi and Porsha have a one-on-one meeting for the first time in years. Nene decides to throw a couples' event. Porsha gives Dennis the surprise of a lifetime for his birthday.

7.title: Sisterhood of the Traveling Peaches

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: A newly pregnant Porsha works at Dennis' restaurant to win over his mother's approval. The men bail on NeNe and Gregg's couples trip. The women board a bus to Destin, Florida, and play a game of truth or dare during which Kandi spills more Dennis tea.

8.title: Final Destin-ation

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: In Destin, Florida, Shamari accepts fashion tips from Marlo. During rainy weather, the ladies put their talents on display in their quest for a crown. The group begins to suspect there is more to Porsha's alcohol cleanse than she's letting on.

9.title: A Mother's Love

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: Cynthia plans an intimate college send-off for Noelle that ends in a major meltdown. Porsha and Dennis are ecstatic about their first sonogram, while Shamari and her mom foster a new bond watching over Shamari's twins. Nene and Gregg host a family meeting with their sons to educate them on Gregg's cancer. After a recent misunderstanding, Kandi tries to mend Momma Joyce and Todd's relationship and turn his sour lemons into lemonade. When it's finally time for Noelle to say goodbye, Cynthia must deal with her own feelings of letting go and restarting her life solo.

10.title: The Wrong Road

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: Porsha is heated after an altercation at Todd's birthday party leads to the Kandi Koated Klick giving Porsha the boot. Mike Hill comes to town with an important question for Cynthia - the same weekend her ex Peter is in town. Eva and Tanya apologize for their Destin shade with a hibachi night for the group followed by a bachelorette trip invite, but the evening goes awry when Porsha and Kandi come face to face in a battle of words.

11.title: Texts, Lies & Therapy

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot: Eva and Tanya's hibachi night continues to go up in flames when Eva is confronted by Porsha over past shady comments. As Gregg's birthday approaches, tension builds between the Leakes as Nene deals with the mounting pressure of being his caretaker. Kandi invites Shamari to be a part of her latest money making venture, while Cynthia's new beau Mike Hill gets put in the hot seat. Porsha seeks guidance when she begins to have second thoughts about trusting Dennis - causing her to finally ask him some hard-hitting questions.

12.title: The Peaches of Tokyo

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

12.plot: While in Tokyo to celebrate her bachelorette party, Eva receives devastating news that threatens to derail the entire trip. Although on a much needed break, Nene still struggles with the hardships of being Gregg's caretaker. Porsha shares a well-kept secret with the rest of the ladies, and later Nene and Tanya get into a heated confrontation that leaves all the women confused.

13.title: Tempers in Tokyo

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

13.plot: After Nene is confronted about a shady comment, tempers spiral out of control. Still devastated about her grandfather's illness, Eva tries to stay in good spirits but an interaction with Marlo takes her over the edge. Cynthia consoles Nene regarding her struggles with Gregg, and the ladies go out for a sexy night in the Red Light District and wind up with a happy ending.

14.title: Lost in Translation

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

14.plot: Eva and the ladies continue their celebration with a bachelorette party that has a shady start, and an unexpected visitor. During a traditional Samurai lesson, some epic one-on-one battles go down, and later, a long-standing rivalry finally starts to fade away. Nene's troubles with Gregg come to a head and leaves her questioning their relationship, while the rest of the girls are left wondering how they can help.

15.title: Let's Make It Official

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

15.plot:

1.title: Welcome One, Welcome ATL

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: DeShawn begins the search for the perfect staff to run her mansion while Lisa learns to balance business and motherhood. Sheree plans a party to celebrate her life post-divorce, but problems erupt when NeNe crashes the party fashionably late and she's not on the list.

2.title: It's My Party!

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: NeNe's friend Dwight convinces her to let go of her anger about Sheree's party, while Kim throws her daughter a party of her own. NeNe and Sheree put aside their differences for the day, but Lisa can't attend as she comes down with the flu.

3.title: Who's Your Poppa?

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: The Housewives take a trip to meet Kim's psychic advisor, where NeNe gets an eerie prediction. Later she gets a letter that reveals a family secret, while Kim decides to pursue her dream of being a country singer and DeShawn plans a black tie gala.

4.title: Bring on the Bling

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: DeShawn invites hundreds of people to her lavish gala, while Kim and Sheree bond during a private spa day, which ultimately puts Kim's friendship with NeNe in jeopardy. Lisa's "Wu Girl" jewelry line takes off and she inks a distribution deal with a jewelry mogul.

5.title: Out of Tune

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: Lisa and NeNe join DeShawn to celebrate her birthday, but the dinner takes a turn when NeNe gossips about Sheree and bashes Kim's music career. Music producer Dallas Austin sends Kim to a music coach and tensions mount when Kim finds out NeNe's been talking behind her back.

6.title: Dream a Little Nightmare

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: Sheree plans a high-end fashion viewing of her fashion line, but refuses to let people see her sweat when the show unravels. NeNe pursues DNA testing to determine the paternity of her father, while DeShawn invites the ladies to her home to mend fences.

7.title: Best of Enemies

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: Lisa's on a mission to get the ladies into the same room, while Sheree turns to Project Runway's Michael Knight to help get her fashion line back on track. Lisa puts on a brave face for her husband who heads back to the NFL, and DeShawn's husband considers retirement after an injury.

8.title: Reunion

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: Bravo fans get an extra dose of drama when your favorite southern gals reunite for the "The Real Housewives of Atlanta" reunion special. Hosted by Bravo programming executive Andy Cohen, see what happens after the cameras stopped rolling.

0.title: The Lost Footage

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

0.plot: The Real Housewives of Atlanta - The Lost Footage" features exclusive moments with everyone's favorite Southern gals, including clips from the explosive reunion show, bowling night with the Hartwells, and lots of dishing and dissing with the ladies of Hotlanta!

1.title: New Attitude, Same ATL

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: The Atlanta ladies are back in the drama-filled second season premiere. Shere decides to throw herself an "Independence Party" to celebrate her recent divorce, while Lisa and her husband discuss the idea of having another baby. Kim decides she wants to design a line of wigs, and new housewife Kandi contemplates her life with fianc, AJ.

2.title: Kim-Tervention

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: NeNe calls Kim to meet up for that long overdue "glass of wine," in an attempt to make amends. Sheree dishes about the recent blow-up she had with a party planner while Lisa and Ed have their first fertility visit. NeNe approaches Sheree about squashing their problems with Kim, and they set up a meeting to talk it out.

3.title: Unbeweavable

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Sheree, NeNe and Kim's reconciliation doesn't go as planned. Kim throws a wig party to celebrate her new endeavor. Kandi meets for lunch with TLC member T-Boz to discuss her musical career, and Sheree throws a gathering to celebrate her new home.

4.title: Mummies, Mommies and Baby Mommas

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: NeNe and Dwight chat during a visit to the salon, while Lisa discusses a trip to L.A. to visit her mom. Drama ensues when Kim learns that the nanny left her girls home alone unsupervised. Later, the ladies attend a King Tut cocktail party with their kids.

5.title: Home Is Where the Heartbreak Is

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: Lisa and NeNe go shopping to prepare for their trip to L.A., and NeNe meets with photographer Derek Blanks to discuss her "Alter Ego" photo shoot. Shere? meets with an event promoter to discuss Mercedes Benz sponsoring her "She By Sheree" fashion show. Kim visits Kandi in the recording studio and as they bond, Kim asks Kandi to produce "Tardy for the Party" for Kim and NeNe to record.

6.title: My Ego Is Bigger Than Your Ego

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: Kim lays down the house rules with her new nanny and then finally buries the hatchet with Lisa. Kandi spills her guts to Shere? and their friendship grows as they realize they have a lot in common. At NeNe's Alter Ego photo shoot, Kim and Shere? talk civilly for the first time and decide to do something nice for Kandi in light of her family tragedy.

7.title: Throwing Shade

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: With the debut of Lisa's clothing line Closet Freak, she is all business, trying to get everything done in time. Meanwhile, Sheree finds out that her "She By Sheree" fashion line debut will have to wait, yet again. NeNe gets tough on her college dropout son Brice, and Kandi calls in a favor to flip "Tardy for the Party" into a song for Kim and NeNe to record.

8.title: Scrambled Egos

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: Kandi pushes an emotional Kim to face her fears and step back into the Atlanta music scene. Newly single Sheree shapes up with her expensive fitness trainer, who attempts to find her love. Meanwhile, all of the ladies get glammed up for a black tie event to reveal their edgy Alter Ego photos, but the night takes a dramatic turn when Kim has a serious accident and steals the spotlight from everyone.

9.title: Precious Pocketbook

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: Kim tells her girlfriend Cori that Big Papa is back in the picture after he whisked her away to the Bahamas. Lisa and Kandi appear in the charity performance of "Pocketbook Monologues," where Kandi's emotional performance wins over the crowd - and Dwight. Meanwhile, NeNe meets with the co-writer of her forthcoming memoir, and Shere? finally throws her long awaited Independence Party, where NeNe confronts Kim and Kandi about recording "Tardy for the Party" without her.

10.title: Better Tardy Than Never

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: Fresh off her fight with Kandi and Kim, NeNe distances herself even further from the ladies. Kim and Kandi team up to finish the recording of "Tardy for the Party" in time for their joint birthday party where Big Papa has a BIG surprise for Kim. Shere? leaves Dwight in charge of her fashion show as she and Tania head to New York to check out her "She by Shere?" samples.

11.title: High Heels & Record Deals

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot: NeNe organizes an over-the-top high heel marathon for her Twisted Hearts Foundation. Lisa and Ed make a tough decision about his NFL career, and Lisa takes a pregnancy test. Despite her engagement with Big Papa, Kim moves forward with starting her wig business.

12.title: Baby Momma & Daddy Drama

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

12.plot: Kim and Shere? return to the "scene of the crime" at FAB to make amends and to plan a surprise engagement party for Kandi and AJ. Shere?'s finished samples for her "She by Shere?" line finally arrive and she unveils them to Dwight for the first time. NeNe and her Uncle Mel travel back to her roots in Athens to give her book writer, Denene, a glimpse into her life growing up.

13.title: Catwalks & Cat Fights

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

13.plot: After almost 2 years "She by Shere?" is about to debut, but big changes are on the horizon and serious trouble is brewing between the ladies. As Lisa prepares for a new future without Ed's NFL paycheck, Kandi finally sees a breakthrough between AJ and her mother, and Shere? tries to keep it together before her clothes go down the catwalk. Meanwhile, it's NeNe who is ready for a meltdown after her return from meeting the man who claims to be her father. She butts heads with Gregg, battles with Kandi at Shere?'s show, and has a blowout fight with Kim.

14.title: Season 2 Reunion: Part I

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

14.plot: Find out what really went down in the ATL when everyone's favorite Southern gals reconvene for the dramatic and much-anticipated two-part reunion special of "The Real Housewives of Atlanta."

15.title: Season 2 Reunion: Part II

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

15.plot: In part two of "The Real Housewives of Atlanta" reunion special, get a behind-the-scenes look at what really went down after the cameras stopped rolling.

16.title: Lost Footage 2

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

16.plot: Check out never-before-seen footage from season two in "The Real Housewives of Atlanta: Lost Footage." Clips include an outrageous belly-dancing class, Kim meeting with a matchmaker, Sheree's fitness video and more. See the ladies at their best - and most hilarious - in this new hour-long episode.

1.title: New Attitude

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Gossip spreads fast when Kim reveals her lesbian affair in the tabloids, and NeNe rekindles her roller coaster relationship with Kim just in time to get the inside scoop. NeNe's got drama of her own -- her marriage is on the rocks and her old friend Dwight has been spreading rumors behind her back. Shereé pursues her long-time dream of becoming an actress and Kandi starts getting back into the dating scene. NeNe, Kim and Sheree hit up a couture shoe event and run into new housewife Phaedra Parks - the pregnant, classy, but sassy attorney-to-the-stars, who arrives with...

2.title: Model Behavior

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: NeNe attends Atlanta's Dogwood Festival with her friend Cynthia and gives her side of the showdown with Dwight. Cynthia, a model who has recently relocated to Atlanta, lends a sympathetic ear. But NeNe's troubles don't end there. Her home life is crumbling, having recently thrown Brice out of the house. Sheree agrees to go on a blind date with a doctor, and surprises herself when she enjoys the dance club he takes her that's located in the wrong part of town. Kim is invited to perform at the White Party, a huge gay circuit party in Palm Springs. Meanwhile, Kandi ...

3.title: White Hot

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Kandi travels to Palm Springs to offer advice and support to Kim, who's been invited to perform at one of the biggest gay circuit parties -- the White Party. With only one song on her playlist is Kim ready for her first concert appearance? NeNe has an honest talk with Brentt about Brice's brush with the law.

4.title: Petty Boughetto

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Despite the toll her marital problems and troubles with Bryson are taking on NeNe, she is determined to get her "happy" back, even if that's through plastic surgery. Phaedra and Cynthia finally find time to get to know each other better as they attend Atlanta's premiere horse racing event, the Steeple Chase. Inspired by a late night host, Kim is ready to be a two-hit wonder and asks Kandi to write her next song. Dwight helps Phaedra plan her over-the-top Kentucky Derby-themed baby shower. Kandi, Cynthia and Kim quickly realize this shower is unlike any other shower ...

5.title: Hot Mama's Day

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: Kim states her views on cheating as a guest on Kandi's web chat show "Kandi Koated Nights." NeNe reveals more than just her new nose to Cynthia, and Sheree has a finger lickin' good time on a date with the "Love Doctor." Meanwhile, Phaedra gets personal with a jar of pickles for her pregnancy photo shoot. When the ladies get together at Cynthia's to celebrate Mother's Day, the topic of sex becomes the main course, but by dessert, NeNe's marital issues take the cake.

6.title: Trashed Collection

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: With Bryson's 90-day deadline to get a job or get out approaching, NeNe hopes introducing her late bloomer to Cynthia's boyfriend and club owner Peter will inspire her son to find a career path. While visiting his daughter, Noelle, Cynthia's ex-fiancé, actor Leon Robinson, discuss Cynthia reservations about marriage. Even while planning a high-end yard sale, Kim begins work on her new track with help from Kandi, but things get heated between the two when creative differences arise. Already puzzled with Phaedra's ever-changing due date, the ladies are shocked to hear ...

7.title: She Can Dance?

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: Sheree is determined to prove she can dance, and signs up to participate in Dancing Stars of Atlanta, a local charity event. Meanwhile, Cynthia is caught off guard when Peter surprises her with a sneaky proposal, and Phaedra packs her finest lingerie in preparation for the birth of her baby. Kandi is fed up with Kim's disrespectful attitude towards the new song she wrote for her, while Kim's preoccupied with her latest crush -- NFL player Kroy Biermann.

8.title: Is There a Doctor in the House?

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: In preparation for the birth of their child, Phaedra and Apollo arrive in Augusta where her doctor will induce the baby. Back in Atlanta, the other girls convene at Kandi's birthday party where Kim and Cynthia grill Dwight on Phaedra's mysterious due date. Meanwhile, Nene meets with a local TV station in hopes of snagging a job as an entertainment reporter. Kandi later visits the soon-to-be-in-labor Phaedra and finally solves the mystery of Phaedra's due date. Sheree invites the ladies over for a party, but drama ensues when NeNe realizes that she knows something ...

9.title: Nene Get Your Gun

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: Phaedra adjusts to motherhood as she brings her new baby home from the hospital and proving it doesn't get easier, Kim wrestles with her daughter's questions about sex. Cynthia plans her dream wedding with a celebrated stylist friend and high-end wedding planner, while NeNe's marriage nears the breaking point as her relationship problems are exposed in a very public way, leading to a dramatic confrontation with Greg.

10.title: Auto-Tuned Up

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: It's time for Kim to face her fears and work with the vocal coach who once told her that she didn't know what she was doing. Meanwhile, Sheree is ready to take her newfound passion for acting to the next level by auditioning for a talent agency and considering a role in a local play. While Phaedra and Apollo bask in the joys of new parenthood, Cynthia is caught in an uncomfortable position when Peter confronts NeNe about taking all of Cynthia's attention away from him.

11.title: Contract Player

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot: It's time for Kim to start rehearsing for her upcoming tour with Kandi, but she's more interested in get-skinny-quick treatments than learning the choreography for her show. Sheree receives some good news about her talent agency audition and enlists Kandi's help to prepare for her role in a local play. Tension lingers from NeNe and Peter's blow-up phone fight. The ladies think that Cynthia's priorities are a bit off, but Cynthia has a plan to smooth things over with NeNe. Meanwhile, Dwight tells Phaedra what everyone has been saying about her mysterious pregnancy. ...

12.title: Not So Fine Print

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

12.plot: With her tour quickly approaching, Kandi has only a week to finish her new album and make sure that Kim is stage ready as her opening act. Cynthia tries to reconcile with NeNe and make up for the awkwardness of her "friendship contract," but NeNe's got bigger problems when she's put on the spot to deliver a big celebrity interview for her local entertainment segment. Mother definitely knows best when Sheree and daughter Tierra go furniture shopping, and Phaedra, fresh out of the maternity ward, is in full protective mommy-mode and confronts Kim about all the ...

13.title: Tour-ture

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

13.plot: Dramas center around Phaedra's baby party. Meanwhile, NeNe prepares for an interview, and Cynthia's fiancé reveals news that might end up jeopardizing her dream wedding.

14.title: Flamingo Road Block

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

14.plot: NeNe's 'keeping it real' as she presents her first on-air interview with star producer Jermaine Dupri for her local news segment; but Kim takes NeNe's on-air mention of Tardy for the Party as a deliberate jab. With their wedding only two weeks away, Peter reveals to Cynthia that their financial situation is dire, putting both their wedding plans and their relationship on the rocks.

15.title: Floridon't

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

15.plot: Kandi's tour bus makes it to Miami, where Phaedra, Sheree and Cynthia are awaiting its arrival. Their plans for a fun, relaxing weekend to celebrate Cynthia's bachelorette are quickly dashed when the bus doors open to reveal Kim and NeNe in the middle of a blowout fight. When pressed by the other women to talk about her upcoming wedding, Cynthia breaks down in tears over the stress of her nearing nuptials.

16.title: The Bride and the Doom

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

16.plot: Back from the Miami trip, Cynthia's rocky road to the altar is nearing the end, but as she struggles with last minute wedding jitters, her mom and her sister urge her to reconsider getting married altogether. Phaedra has a surprisingly emotional reaction to heading back to work after her maternity leave.

17.title: Reunion: Part 1

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

17.plot: Hosted by Bravo's Andy Cohen, the ladies of Hotlanta, Cynthia Bailey, Kandi Burruss, NeNe Leakes, Phaedra Parks, Sheree Whitfield, Kim Zolciak get together to set the record straight on some of the most talked-about antics of the season and answer some of America's most burning questions.

18.title: Reunion: Part 2

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

18.plot: Hosted by Bravo's Andy Cohen, part II of the reunion has the ladies of Hotlanta, Cynthia Bailey, Kandi Burruss, NeNe Leakes, Phaedra Parks, Sheree Whitfield, and Kim Zolciak get together to set the record straight on some of the most talked-about antics of the season and answer some of America's most burning questions.

0.title: Before They Were Stars

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

0.plot: Want to get the dirt on your favourite Southern Belles? Join the housewives as they reminisce over their early years and reveal stories from then and now.

1.title: Nothing Ventured, Nothing Gained

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: The ladies of Atlanta are back and handling their business. Kandi branches out from her music career to start an adult toy line, while Phaedra begins her own strange undertakings. Cynthia gets the buzz going for her modeling school with a little help from celebrity runway coach Miss J. A very pregnant Kim prepares to move in to a luxury home with boyfriend, baby-daddy, and young NFL star Kroy Biermann. NeNe's stock has risen since hanging with Donald Trump on Celebrity Apprentice, but Shereé confronts her on a business deal gone bad.

2.title: Surprisingly Rich

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: Fresh off her verbal smack down with Shereé, NeNe decides to take a break from Atlanta by rounding up Cynthia and Kandi for a girl's getaway weekend of fun, sun and Lesbian Pride in Miami. Phaedra's fascination with the dead goes a step further as she explores opening her own family funeral business, but Apollo's creeped out by Phaedra's new passion. Shereé and Kim have some of their own girl time to discuss Kim and Kroy's future plans. Meanwhile, Kroy and Sweetie conspire to throw an intimate surprise bash for a very pregnant Kim's 33rd birthday, complete with ...

3.title: Shower the Baby, Muzzle the Boy

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Phaedra and Apollo deal with the consequences of a case of mistaken identity Shereé is moving on up by overseeing the construction of a new house. Peter gets a warning from Cynthia's baby daddy about the importance of getting along with your in-laws. NeNe deals with her youngest son, Brent's adjustment to living in two homes after her separation from Gregg. Meanwhile, Kim throws a wedding-size baby shower for Kroy, but the shower games are a little more testosterone-driven than Kim had planned!

4.title: Jewels Be Dangled

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Phaedra does the proper Southern thing and apologizes to Kim for her husband's behavior at Kim's baby shower. Shereé takes Phaedra along to see her Chateau Shereé construction site, only to find no progress has been made. Kandi plans her 35th birthday bash despite a case of the biological clock blues. The party heats up when Phaedra presents a "Ridickulous" surprise that neither Kandi -- nor her mom -- will ever forget. Meanwhile, Cynthia's attempt at making peace between her husband and sister backfires, leaving her torn between her new family and her old one. Kim ...

5.title: Whine Bar

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: Peter's Bar One sneak preview party is just days away when his investor bounces a $40,000 check. Cynthia may have to bail her husband out, even though she promised not to invest in the bar. Shereé has her own financial concerns and confronts her ex-husband about four years of missed child support payments. Meanwhile, Kim has a heart-to-heart with her daughter Brielle over fears that the new baby will break up the family. Kandi has her own mother-daughter chat, apologizing to Mama Joyce for the incident at her birthday party. Cynthia hosts a fashion show, where Phaedra...

6.title: Three Wigs and a Baby

Porsha plans a girls outing.

3.title: Ghosts of Boyfriends Past

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Kenya and Matt take their relationship to the next level with a road trip to Matt's family reunion. Cynthia struggles with the idea of not being on good terms with Peter after they divorce. Bob tries to coax Shereé into going out on a date, while Porsha comes up with her own idea of a modern family. Kandi gets an unexpected visit that has her questioning what's best for her daughter.

4.title: Another Spin Around the Block

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: Phaedra focuses on uniting the group, but charity takes a backseat when Kenya and Shereé go at it once again. Bob finally takes Shereé out on a date.

5.title: Shade Grenade

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: Reeling from the news that her son has run into trouble with the law, Sheree leans on Bob for support. Kenya and Matt's relationship continues to spiral downward. While Cynthia and Noelle begin to look for a new home, Mama Joyce surprises Kandi and Todd with a special evening. Phaedra receives a disturbing phone call that turns her world upside down.

6.title: Tastes Like Trouble

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: Cynthia's divorce takes a turn when Peter starts talking to the press. While Kenya hopes to reconcile her differences with Matt, Porsha decides she is ready to buy her first home. Kandi hosts an afternoon of tasty eats, but Mama Joyce's choice of words leaves a bad taste in Phaedra's mouth. Shereé spills the tea on Porsha's past.

7.title: Model Behavior

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: Phaedra calls Kandi to clear the air, but the conversation takes a turn. Shereé acts as momager to son Kairo. Porsha introduces her boyfriend to the family and he reveals something Porsha wasn't expecting. Cynthia awaits news of whether her offer on her dream home was accepted. In the aftermath of Kenya's argument with Matt, she calls upon her dad for advice -- but nothing can prepare her for her next encounter with Matt.

8.title: Bosom Buddies

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: The details surrounding Kandi and Phaedra's lunch begin to spread like wildfire, leaving Porsha on a mission to defend Phaedra. When Porsha and Shereé decide to confront Kandi, everyone is left speechless when new accusations are brought to the table. Cynthia looks to get a different type of makeover, while her daughter and soon-to-be-ex share a tearful reunion. Kandi celebrates her daughter's birthday as Shereé deals with the cost of having expensive taste and Porsha takes an unusual exercise class.

9.title: Char-Lotta Drama

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: Kenya is invited to host Peter's grand opening of Club One, but Cynthia is disappointed to discover she was not invited to join. Kandi feels betrayed by a former employee as she gears up for her Bedroom Kandi convention. Shereé prepares to drop a novel, while Porsha temporarily moves back in with her mom. Phaedra gets a visit from an unexpected guest and Peter's grand opening gets derailed by a few surprise visitors.

10.title: Uncharitable Behavior

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: Kenya returns to discover "Moore Manor" has been vandalized again by her estranged boyfriend. Phaedra gives Kenya legal advice, and in the process reveals secrets about her marriage. Cynthia and Noelle move out of their townhouse that they once shared with Peter, and some surprise houseguests show up at Kandi's. Drama pops off at Phaedra's pop-up shop between Kenya and a visitor.

11.title: Thelma and Louise Take Flint

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot: Phaedra and Kenya rekindle their friendship as they travel to Flint, Michigan, to participate in Phaedra's summer camp. Back in Atlanta, Cynthia makes herself at home at Kandi's house. Bob gets another shot to try to win back Shereé, while Porsha starts seeing red flags in her relationship with Todd. After a cathartic and emotional camp experience, Phaedra brings everyone together to discuss a camping trip with all the ladies -- but concerns about Porsha's past anger issues lead some of the women to question whether or not they should go on the trip.

12.title: Into the Woods

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

12.plot: Phaedra and Kenya want to move forward with their plans for a glamping trip; Cynthia meets with Matt to get to the bottom of his anger issues; Kandi throws a surprise engagement party for Shamea, during which Shereé spills some tea.

13.title: If These Woods Could Talk

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

13.plot: The women reach the woods for a weekend of glamping, but they are shocked to learn they'll be sleeping in tents; Marlo confronts Kenya over unresolved issues; the women bond over outdoor activities; Kandi learns of the rumors being spread about her.

14.title: Loose Lips Sink Ships

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

14.plot: The ladies return to Atlanta; Cynthia plans her Cargo Fashion Show; Porsha wonders if Todd is ready for a serious relationship; Phaedra hears news concerning her divorce; Kenya gives Cynthia a special gift to help jumpstart her dating life.

15.title: Lei It All on the Table

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

15.plot: Kandi relays Porsha's accusations to Cynthia, Shereé, Kenya and Shamea, all while Porsha spills the details to her sister.

16.title: Maui Mayhem

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

16.plot: The group's first dinner in Maui escalates to new heights as Kandi and Porsha erupt over who's to blame for the rumors that have surfaced. Kandi tries to shake off the drama by planning a speed boat adventure without Porsha, meanwhile Shereé and Bob's courtship hits a major speed bump. Phaedra attempts to mend the ladies' broken friendships by organizing an emergency "restoration service" and Bob tries to salvage what's left of his relationship with Shereé.

17.title: Aloha and Goodbye

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

17.plot: After Phaedra's attempt to reunite the group fails, Kandi and Todd decide to bring everyone together for a roast of Peter. Shereé is forced to decide if she should move forward with or without Bob, while Cynthia and Peter come to terms with the end of their marriage. Meanwhile, Kenya and Phaedra's newfound friendship is put to the test as Kenya hosts a party that has Phaedra feeling seasick on dry land.

18.title: Baby Nups & Breakups

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

18.plot: Cynthia proves she's more than a pretty face to Atlanta's ''fashionistas;'' Phaedra helps Kandi's former employee seek financial resolution; Porsha decides she's ready to take her relationship with Todd to the next level; Matt resurfaces.

19.title: Side Dishes and Side Pieces

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

19.plot: Kandi and Todd race to get the restaurant up and running; Porsha celebrates Phaedra's birthday; as the women gather at the restaurant, an unexpected guest shows up, leading to new revelations about Phaedra and Apollo's divorce.

20.title: Chateau She Did That

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

20.plot: Shereé throws a housewarming party to unveil Chateau Shereé; Kenya finds herself going toe-to-toe with a mega-blast from the past; Phaedra lends a helping hand to Kandi's former disgruntled employee; Porsha visits her father's resting place.

21.title: Reunion, Part 1

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

21.plot: Kenya and Shereé go head-to-head, addressing the drama surrounding building their homes. Phaedra and Kenya discuss their friendship to determine if there is any hope at saving their relationship. Kenya questions the effectiveness of Porsha's anger management, which leads to a verbal encounter between Kandi and Porsha.

22.title: Reunion, Part 2

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

22.plot: Kenya reflects on her complicated relationship with Matt and confirms the status of where things stand today.

23.title: Reunion, Part 3

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

23.plot: The men join the conversation, with Bob addressing his shortcomings in his relationship with Shereé, and Todd revealing he still has a bone to pick with Phaedra. Cynthia and Peter reveal what life has been like post-divorce and Shamea sits down with the ladies to confront her BFF Porsha, raising questions about Porsha's budding friendship with Phaedra.

24.title: Reunion, Part 4

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

24.plot: Part four of the reunion begins diving into the aftermath of the "Lesbiangate" drama. The cameras go beyond the curtain to capture behind-the-scenes moments, tears and tense conversations as the ladies try to recover from a painful realization to see if there is any chance of moving forward after an explosive season.

25.title: Secrets Revealed

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

25.plot: Phaedra and Porsha explore edible hotel decor; Kandi's baby has his first photo shoot; Shereé and Porsha share a moment that sheds light on one of the biggest conflicts of the season; Porsha and Peter get to the root of their longstanding feud.

1.title: 50 Shades of Cynthia

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: Kenya returns home from vacation with big news but quickly learns that her secret is already out. Despite the explosive rumors from last year, Kandi shows no signs of defeat as business continues to boom at the OLG restaurant. Meanwhile, Porsha struggles with letting people back into her life after being betrayed, and Cynthia celebrates her fiftieth birthday one more time. Things heat up at the party when NeNe comes face to face with a former friend.

2.title: Say Yes to Distress

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

2.plot: After the showdown at Cynthia's 50th birthday party, Porsha's sister, Lauren and niece, move into her palace. Cynthia struts her way back into the dating scene with a much younger beau. After the fallout from the painful history with ex-husband Bob was made public, Shereé meets with a life coach to help get her life back on track. Meanwhile, Kenya is confronted with scrutiny about her husband, which turns out to be more than she can handle. A few of the ladies attend Shamea's bridal shower, and all seems well until Porsha gets called out for being a shady best friend.

3.title: Chateau Get Down

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

3.plot: Porsha clings to her family after losing yet another friend, but is shocked by accusations from her sister. Meanwhile, a new man challenges Cynthia's singles game. After an unexpected incident, NeNe is suddenly left home alone to fend for herself, while Kenya struggles to find new ways to connect with her long-distance husband. Shereé plans to turn the Chateau into a disco palace, only to have the dance floor pulled out from under her when the party planner leaves her in a serious bind.

4.title: All White Never Forget Showdown

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

4.plot: NeNe juggles planning an unforgettable soiree while nursing Gregg back to health, and tensions rise when Kim Zolciak-Biermann shows up to the party unannounced. Kandi discovers the difficulties of balancing life and business during one of her most important milestones to date. Shereé is forced to come to terms with the truth, while Porsha tries to mend broken family ties.

5.title: Petty Party

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

5.plot: NeNe's "Never Forget" party concludes in an unforgettable way, leaving the girls trying to make sense of what transpired between Kenya and Kim. Cynthia opens up to her daughter about her new man, while Kenya grapples with heartbreaking family news. Despite lingering tensions, Shereé invites the girls on a "healing" trip to San Francisco, where she reveals a shocking secret about her romantic life. A beautiful dinner takes an ugly turn when NeNe and Porsha air their grievances, and all bets are off.

6.title: All Aboard the Shady Express

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

6.plot: Shereé worries that her "healing" trip to San Francisco is ruined in the aftermath of NeNe and Porsha's explosive confrontation. The ladies rally around Kenya and surprise her with a wedding celebration. NeNe makes a shocking revelation about Shereé's new man, and while Porsha attempts to repair her relationship with Kandi, the group starts to question whether Kenya and Cynthia are truly best friends.

7.title: Rock the Boat

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

7.plot: Cynthia and Peter reunite to discuss business moves in Atlanta, while her date on a boat with Will gets rocked when Kandi and Todd go fishing for the truth. Meanwhile, Porsha embarks on her first blind date and Kandi confronts the challenges of raising a teenager as she tries to enjoy some much needed family time. Shereé finally tackles a personal goal but an unexpected phone call leaves her wondering if her new love is strong enough to stand the test of time.

8.title: A Mad Tea Party

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

8.plot: Kandi and Todd face criticism from the Old Lady Gang as they search for a new general manager who can help turn business around at the restaurant. Meanwhile, Cynthia and Marlo come together to serve tea - literally - to NeNe and Porsha with the hopes of bringing the two former friends back together. Kenya and Shereé make an unlikely duo as they join forces to produce a PSA against domestic violence but an unexpected setback arises the day of the shoot and nearly shuts production down.

9.title: The Peaches of Wrath

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

9.plot: Things take an unexpected turn when Shereé invites Kim and NeNe to dinner. Porsha gets an opportunity that could take her career in a new direction. Shereé receives good news about her boyfriend, while Cynthia faces new scrutiny about her interest in Will. Annoyed with everyone's concern about her issues with Porsha, NeNe gathers the ladies to address all the other elephants in the room.

10.title: Storming Out

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

10.plot: Porsha organizes a trip to Houston to help Hurricane Harvey victims, but one of the ladies steals her thunder with a competing charity event. Meanwhile, Shereé struggles to get to the bottom of NeNe's issues with her prison boo. Riley turns 15 and learns to drive, while Kandi tries to help her repair her relationship with her father. Tensions rise when Kenya has a tough time taking constructive criticism, setting off a storm of her own.

11.title: Tea is of the Essence

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

11.plot: Kandi invites everyone to her Essence magazine cover release party, where NeNe introduces the ladies to a fashionable new friend. While Kenya copes with separation anxiety from her husband, Cynthia is forced to face the reality of where things stand with Will.

12.title: Peaches be Trippin'

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

12.plot: Cynthia deals with the fallout from Porsha's news about Will, leading her to question their budding relationship. Porsha sits down with an unexpected ally, while Kenya begins shifting priorities after some potentially life changing news. Cynthia enlists NeNe's help in getting all the girls together for a girl's trip to Barcelona and Porsha attempts to squash all of the beef in the group by hosting a vegan dinner. As everyone gets ready to leave for Barcelona, the ladies are all shocked to learn who is - and who isn't - going to Spain.

13.title: Livin' La Villa Loca

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

13.plot: The ladies' arrival in Barcelona gets off to a bumpy start when Cynthia confronts Eva and Porsha. Later, Kim gets wind of a joke made at her expense leading to an explosive next move.

14.title: Barcelona Breakdown

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

14.plot: In the aftermath of Kim's text heard 'round the world,' the women demand that Shereé put her friend in check. Porsha wreaks havoc on the streets of Barcelona, and Cynthia gets over her man problems by taking a dip in the lady pond. It's all fun and games until things go off the rails during a heated debate. As tensions rise the trip comes to a surprising end for one of the ladies.

15.title: Let There Be Light and Love

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

15.plot: In the wake of Porsha's early departure, the women attempt to heal and come together to salvage the final days of the Barcelona trip. An impromptu photo shoot raises questions about NeNe's past with Shereé's boyfriend Tyrone. In the spirit of positivity, Cynthia has the ladies reflect on their past and futures with one another during a day trip to Costa Brava, but circumstances beyond their control complicate their final night.

16.title: Driving Miss Kim

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

16.plot: The ladies' return home from Barcelona with the drama not too far behind. NeNe and Kim face off on social media over the controversial video Kim sent to all the ladies during their trip. Meanwhile, Porsha shakes off her Spain sorrows by preparing for her upcoming play, and Kandi is confronted with an uncomfortable decision regarding her group, Xscape's tour. Things reach a boiling point as Kandi and Kim sit down for the first time in years and in a turn of events, NeNe faces one of the worst weeks.

17.title: ReMarcable

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

17.plot: Tyrone makes an exciting proclamation to Shereé, while her daughter comes home from college and grills her about the romance. After her abrupt exit from Barcelona, Porsha blows off some steam with Rickey Smiley. Kandi worries that dropping NeNe from the Xscape Tour will cost them their friendship, while NeNe teaches her son Brentt to learn from her mistakes. Kenya returns to Atlanta to screen her domestic violence PSA, and a surprise guest shuts down the haters for good.

18.title: Nightmare on Peachtree Street

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

18.plot: Kandi is busy as ever as she gears up for her Xscape tour and Broadway debut, while also helping Eva throw a spooky Halloween birthday party. Porsha preps for opening night of her stage play, while Shereé feels betrayed by a friend. At Eva's party, NeNe manages to turn a negative into a positive, while Cynthia taps into her masculine side. Kim and NeNe come face-to-face for the first time since Roachgate, but not all the bugs have been worked out yet.

19.title: Reunion Part 1

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

19.plot: The three-part reunion kicks off with a bang when a shocking revelation is dropped early, leaving the ladies utterly speechless. Then, Kandi and Porsha get into a heated exchange of words as they attempt to unpack their complicated relationship and work through unresolved issues. Next, the ladies are joined by Marlo Hampton and Kenya is taken to task on keeping the details of her marriage hidden behind closed doors. NeNe reflects on the emotional season she's endured and Porsha works to defend herself against a myriad of accusations that her apologies are insincere.

20.title: Reunion Part 2

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

20.plot: During part two of the reunion Eva Marcille joins the ladies and wastes no time questioning the sincerity of Cynthia's love interest. Keeping on the topic of love, the ladies get candid with their opinions surrounding Shereé's prison bae and both she and Cynthia find themselves in the hot seat defending their relationship status. As the dust settles, tensions rise once again when Kim returns to the reunion couches for the first time since season six, bringing her face-to-face with frenemy turned enemy NeNe for the first time in months.

21.title: Reunion Part 3

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )

21.plot: Emotions reach a boiling point with Kim at the center of it all. Kim reflects on her return to the show which leads to a fiery verbal encounter between she and Kenya. There is no holding back when NeNe and Kim go head-to-head in the ultimate war of words, but with a decade worth of friendship between them, could this be the final breaking point?

-1.title: Reunion Part 3 Supersized

episode of.title: The Real Housewives of Atlanta (TV Series 2008– )
